resources.string: Allows Tagtalk Admins to control, manage and monitor the device
Taglock Device Admin helps the user to get special privileges, e.g. to access the Taglock features. These privileges can only be acquired by accepting these policies.
What should we call your device?
You can search device using its name from dashboard.(e.g. TL-City Code-Box code)
These permissions are necessary for Taglock to work properly.
Activate TagLock Device Admin to provide better kiosk environment.
We need "Usage Access" permission to provide app block/unblock facility. Enable "TagLock" on the following screen.
We need "Notification Access" permission to block notifications, instead unread notifications are displayed as badge on app icons in TagLock homescreen. Enable "TagLock" on the following screen.
This permission is required to enable installation of apk\'\s pushed from TagLock dashboard. Please check/enable "Unknown Sources" option in following screen.
We need download manager enabled to support. Press "OK" and "ENABLE" on the following screen.
We require this permission to hide status bar, show notification center and background running apps, etc.

We wil need this permission to change device brightness, device rotation, device screen timeout settings and create hotspot, etc. Note: If you see that it is already enabled, just uncheck and recheck so that permission will grant properly.
We need this permission to access phone number, cellular network info and ongoing calls.
TagLock need camera permission to open camera, flashlight and capture security incidents, etc.
TagLock require device storage permission to access files and folders.
TagLock require this permission to access accounts and contacts.
TagLock needs location permission to get the location of device and show on dashboard.
